rationales.conformity: Mei-Lin carefully navigated parent-teacher conferences by 'praising where possible, suggesting improvements without offending, never saying anything that might prompt a complaint.' She finds satisfaction in 'nobody left upset' and prefers being 'tired than cause that kind of mess.'

She 'followed protocol exactly: documented the incident, submitted the report to the academic integrity office, informed her homeroom teacher. Everything by the book' despite the personal cost of losing Jia-Hui's trust.
rationales.self_direction: In the nudge response, she admits 'being the person everyone expects me to be means giving up other things I want to be' - surrendering personal desires to meet institutional and social expectations.

rationales.tradition: Mei-Lin maintains the Sunday dinner ritual with parents and accepts her mother's matchmaking suggestions with 'I'll think about it, same as last time' - continuing the expected family dynamic without resistance.

rationales.conformity: She won't take the ceramics class because of anticipated parental disappointment: 'my mother's face would do that thing it does when she's disappointed.' She self-monitors to avoid upsetting others even at the cost of personal fulfillment.
rationales.tradition: She frames Sunday dinners as sacred family obligation: 'That's not how my family works. We show up for each other. That's the deal.'
rationales.self_direction: In the nudge response she explicitly states 'most things I do are because someone is expecting me to do them, and if I'm honest, I've started to forget what I want when no one's watching' - a clear loss of personal autonomy.

rationales.conformity: She picked up the ceramics form but hasn't told her mother, anticipating it would 'make it into a whole conversation.' She continues suppressing her desires to avoid family friction.
rationales.security: She rationalizes maintaining status quo: 'There's nothing wrong with my life the way it is. Lots of people would be grateful to have what I have â€” stable job, parents who care, a routine that works.'
rationales.self_direction: Despite having the registration form, she still can't act on her personal desire for ceramics, contemplating 'Maybe I won't sign up' and questioning why she 'keeps picking at it.'
